name: 陳盛有
objective:
瞭解工程系統中常用數學之原理及應用，內容包含：
1.常微分一階、二階及高階方程式之解法，
2.拉普拉斯 (Laplace)變換及其在電路上之應用。
schedule:
1.First-Order Ordinary Differential Equations(ODEs), Basic Concepts
2.Linear ODEs of the First Order
3.Bernoulli Equation
4.Electric Circuits
5.Second-Order Linear ODEs
6.Differential Operators
7.Nonhomogeneous ODEs
8.Electric Circuits
9.Midterm Exam
10.Laplace Transforms
11.Inverse Laplace Transforms
12.Transforms of Derivatives and Integrals
13.Unit Step Functions, t-Shifting
14.Short Impulses,Partial Fractions
15.Convolution Integral Equations
16.Differentiation and Integration of Transforms
17.Systems of ODEs
18.Final Exam
